mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: By Bodley and Garner 1889-91, nave, chancel and south aisle. By G F Bodley: 1907-9 tower, 1908 north aisle and south porch. Some of this work is posthumous as Bodley died in 1907 and the practice was continued by C G Hare as Bodley and Hare. -- https://historicengland.org.uk/listing/the-list/list-entry/1337450 [work]
